author: dpa
title: Medien: Streaming-Boom flacht ab - YouTube stark
text:
Medien Streaming-Boom flacht ab - YouTube stark
Für die Streaminganbieter sind die Jahre des riesigen Wachstums offensichtlich vorbei. Das ältere Publikum wird jetzt als Zielgruppe attraktiver, besagt eine großangelegte Analyse von Medienforschern.
Berlin - Die Streaminganbieter in Deutschland erreichen nur bei Menschen über 30 noch Zuwächse. „Erstmals ziehen die 30- bis 49-Jährigen bei der Streaming-Abo-Nutzung mit 68 Prozent an den Jüngeren (14-29 Jahre) mit 66 Prozent vorbei“, steht in der Bewegtbild-Studie „Screens in Motion 2025“ der Zeitschrift „TV Spielfilm“ aus dem Burda Verlag.
Aufgrund des höheren Bevölkerungsanteils stelle die mittlere Altersgruppe ohnehin die mit Abstand größte Masse der Streaming-Abo-Nutzer. Die Autoren der Studie sehen alles in allem erstmals eine „gewisse Sättigung“ auf Deutschlands Streamingmarkt.
Streaming schrumpft im jungen Publikum leicht
Die Langzeitentwicklung der Sehdauern seit 2019 zeigt für jüngere Abonnenten sogar einen minimalen Rückgang der täglichen Streaming-Sehdauer auf hohem Niveau von 2 Minuten auf 1 Stunde 16 Minuten, wie in der Studie zu lesen ist. „In der mittleren Altersgruppe (30-49 Jahre) hat die Sehdauer Streaming im gleichen Zeitraum um 32 Minuten zugenommen, auf nun ebenfalls 1 Stunde 16 Minuten.“
Die über 50-Jährigen gucken den Ergebnissen zufolge aktuell nur 42 Minuten täglich Streamingangebote, das ist aber eine Zunahme um 25 Minuten. Größeres Neukunden-Potenzial ist demnach bei dem älteren Publikum zu vermuten.
Zwar seien Netflix und Prime Video nach wie vor die Platzhirsche. Auf Platz drei von den Nutzeranteilen her folge allerdings auf ähnlichem Niveau schon YouTube, also eine Video-Plattform. „Warum das so ist? Es hängt sicherlich mit dem Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis zusammen“, sagte die Verantwortliche von „Screens in Motion“, Marion Sperlich, der Deutschen Presse-Agentur in Berlin. Sie ist zugleich Head of Research Market Media Insights im Burda-Verlag.
Trend zum Abo-Hopping
„Hier besteht eine zunehmende Sensibilität bei den Streaming-Abonnenten“, erläuterte Sperlich. „Stehen Preis und Nutzung nicht mehr im Verhältnis, das heißt sind zum Beispiel nur noch wenige interessierende Formate verfügbar, wird ein Abo gekündigt und ein neues bei einem anderen Anbieter abgeschlossen. Abo-Hopping könnte man das nennen. Prime Video und Netflix scheinen folglich ihre Nutzer am besten mit ihren Inhalten bei Laune zu halten.“
Die Mediatheken der Öffentlich-Rechtlichen hätten am Streamingboom der vergangenen Jahre durchaus profitiert, so Sperlich. „Wir wissen, dass die lineare TV-Nutzung zurückgeht, aktuell um 45 Minuten Sehdauer pro Tag im Vergleich zu 2019. Die Mediatheken der Sender allerdings, die im Prinzip die gleichen Inhalte anbieten, werden stärker genutzt. Das heißt, das, was klassisches TV an Sehdauer oder auch Nutzeranteilen verliert, geht nicht allein auf die Streaming-Abo-Anbieter über, sondern auch auf die eigenen Mediatheken.“
Für „Screens in Motion 2025“ hat das Marktforschungsinstitut YouGov Anfang März rund 2.000 Menschen befragt. Die Studie gilt als repräsentativ für die Bevölkerung ab 14 Jahren mit Onlinezugang in Deutschland.

author: The Community Post
title: Pixune: Pushing the Boundaries of 3D Animation with Unmatched Creativity | User | minstercommunitypost.com
text:
Introduction
3D animation has revolutionized the world of entertainment, gaming, marketing, and more. One studio that has mastered the craft of storytelling through breathtaking visuals is Pixune . Whether you’re looking for high-quality character animation, engaging game cinematics, or impressive advertising visuals, Pixune delivers stunning results. This article dives deep into Pixune’s expertise, services, and what makes it stand out in the competitive world of 3D animation.
What is 3D Animation?
3D animation is the process of creating moving digital images in a three-dimensional space. This technique is widely used in films, video games, advertisements, and virtual reality.
The Evolution of 3D Animation
From early CGI effects in movies to photorealistic animations in modern games, 3D animation has come a long way. Studios like Pixune are at the forefront of this evolution, constantly pushing boundaries. Pixune is a top-tier 3D animation studio known for creating stunning visuals that bring stories to life.
Why Choose Pixune for 3D Animation?
Expertise: Years of experience in delivering high-quality 3D animation. Creativity: A team of passionate artists and animators. Technology: Cutting-edge tools for seamless animation. Customization: Tailored solutions to meet specific client needs.
Services Offered by Pixune Character Animation
Pixune specializes in breathing life into characters with realistic expressions and movements.
Game Cinematics
Game developers rely on Pixune to create immersive cinematics that captivate players.
Architectural Visualization
From real estate to urban planning, Pixune’s 3D animations help visualize projects with stunning accuracy.
Motion Graphics
Perfect for branding and advertising, Pixune’s motion graphics add a dynamic touch to marketing campaigns.
Product Animation
Pixune helps businesses showcase their products in 3D, making presentations more engaging and informative.
The Creative Process at Pixune
Concept Development – Understanding the client’s vision. Storyboarding – Creating a visual blueprint. Modeling – Designing characters and environments. Texturing and Rigging – Adding realism and movement capabilities. Animation – Bringing everything to life. Rendering – Producing the final high-quality output. Post-Production – Editing and refining the animation.
Industries That Benefit from Pixune’s 3D Animation
Entertainment (Movies, TV Shows) Gaming (Game Trailers, Cutscenes) Marketing & Advertising (Commercials, Product Demos) Education & Training (E-learning, Simulations) Architecture & Real Estate (Virtual Tours, Concept Visualization)
Pixune’s Commitment to Quality and Innovation
Pixune doesn’t just follow industry standards; it sets them. With a focus on innovation and precision, the studio ensures every project exceeds expectations.
Tools and Technologies Used at Pixune
Autodesk Maya – For modeling and animation Blender – Open-source 3D creation ZBrush – Digital sculpting Adobe After Effects – Post-production enhancements Unity & Unreal Engine – Game development
Behind the Scenes: How a 3D Animation is Made
The journey from a concept to a final animated video involves multiple stages, each requiring skill, patience, and attention to detail.
The Importance of Storytelling in 3D Animation
Great animation isn’t just about visuals; it’s about compelling storytelling. Pixune ensures every project has a strong narrative backbone.
Pixune’s Top 3D Animation Projects
Fantasy RPG Game Cinematics Realistic Product Commercials Animated Short Films
The Role of AI in 3D Animation
Artificial Intelligence is transforming animation workflows, making processes faster and more efficient. Pixune leverages AI to enhance production quality.
The Future of 3D Animation
With advancements in VR, AR, and AI, the future of 3D animation looks more promising than ever. Pixune continues to adapt to these changes to stay ahead of the curve.
How to Hire Pixune for Your 3D Animation Needs
Interested in working with Pixune ? Visit their official website, check out their portfolio, and reach out for a consultation.
Conclusion
Pixune has established itself as a leader in the 3D animation industry. With a commitment to quality, innovation, and storytelling, the studio continues to create breathtaking animations for a diverse range of clients. If you're looking for a professional 3D animation studio, Pixune is your go-to choice.

author: VNExplorer
title: Ana Fa Lavaka allegedly stabbed by a neighbour in her Brisbane home is remembered as a 'devoted daughter, sister and mother'
text:
Ana Fa Lavaka, 43, allegedly stabbed in the chestDorothy Jane Downie, 55, charged with murderREAD MORE: Alleged murder in upper-class suburb
A woman who was allegedly murdered by her neighbour has been described by grief-stricken loved ones as a ‘devoted daughter, sister and mother’.
Ana Fa Lavaka, 43, was allegedly murdered by Dorothy Jane Downie, 55, in a unit complex on Oxford Street in Hamilton, Brisbane, at about 8.45am on Thursday.
Emergency services found the mother-of-one critically injured from multiple wounds including a stab wound to the chest.
She was rushed to the Royal Brisbane and Women’s Hospital where doctors pronounced her dead as a result of her injuries.
Downie appeared before the Brisbane Magistrates Court on Friday where she was charged with murder and enter dwelling with intent.
Ana Fa Lavaka, 43, (pictured) was allegedly murdered by Dorothy Jane Downie, 55, in a unit complex on Oxford Street in Hamilton, Brisbane, at 8.45am on Thursday
Forensic were seen putting evidence into brown paper bags at the home on Thursday
Emergency services found Ms Lavaka critically injured at the Hamilton unit complex (pictured)
Ms Lavaka’s relative, Ana Kauffusi, shared a tribute online in the hours after the alleged murder.
‘ Both born in the same year, same month… I was older than you by 22 days. B1 and B2,’ she wrote.
‘You would always hate it when I tell everyone you were named after me.
‘We had plans for our 50th birthday. You wanted to go on a cruise clearly knowing I get sea sick.
‘I stayed up last night waiting for your call cos (sic) we had a lot to complain about for yesterday.’
Others from Ms Lavaka’s local Tongan community shared their sympathies for her family on social media.
‘Ana was known to many as our avid baker, devoted daughter, sister and most importantly mother to her beautiful daughter Amelia,’ one person wrote.
In court, police prosecutor Tara Williams made an urgent forensic request for a sample of Downie’s blood before it was too late, the Courier Mail reports.
‘The urgency is in relation to the level of drugs whether prescription or non-prescription present in her blood at the time,’ she told the court.
‘Over time the longer it takes to deal with this application the levels are going to change your honour. It’s going to result in incomplete information for the prosecution and for the defence to consider.’
Downie’s defence, Daniel Hannay, said police believed his client had a history of ‘delusions of grandeur and psychosis’, which he had yet to address.
Mr Hannay said Downie needed to first be attended to by a mental health nurse and did not oppose Sgt Williams’ request for a blood sample.
Ms Lavaka died at the Royal Brisbane and Women’s Hospital on Thursday
A crime scene was set up at the Oxford Street complex (pictured) on Thursday
Detectives (pictured) arrived at the public housing unit complex to door-knock residents
Magistrate Hackett said that despite Downie’s mental health issues, the evidence requested by Sgt Williams had the ‘potential to be highly relevant and could be lost’.
No application was made for bail and Downie did not appear in court on Friday.
She was remanded in custody and will not be required to attend her next court appearance on February 14.
Detective Inspector John Mison confirmed officers had attended the unit complex previously ‘on a number of occasions’.
‘This is a very sad tragic loss of life,’ he told reporters on Thursday.
The unit complex is multi-unit public housing run by the Department of Housing.
Anyone who may have information is urged contact Crime Stoppers.

author: 每日商报
title: 中信银行信用卡积极践行ESG，推动绿色金融发展
text:
商报讯 （记者 叶晓珺 通讯员 薛圣召） 在社会经济绿色转型的背景下，环境、社会和治理（ESG）已成为金融行业高质量发展的重要衡量标准。作为国有金融企业， 中信银行 （ 601998 ）信用卡中心积极响应国家“双碳”战略，以绿色金融创新为核心，持续深化ESG实践。近日，在“2024第一财经金融价值榜·金融峰会”上，中信银行信用卡中心凭借积极履行国企责任，以绿色金融创新持续开展ESG特色实践，荣获年度“最具ESG领先品牌影响力机构”奖项。
　　近年来，中信银行信用卡中心持续践行绿色发展理念，全力做好绿色金融大文章，以“中信碳账户”为依托，实现绿色低碳行为数字化、可视化、资产化和价值化，积极引导社会公众的绿色消费转型。截至2024年末，“中信碳账户”开户量突破2000万户，累计碳减排量超过16万吨，成为广大用户低碳生活的绿色账户。
　　此外，中信银行以“中信碳账户”为载体，发挥外部协同效应，搭建“绿·信·汇”低碳生态平台，携手行业伙伴，推出绿色消费体系，覆盖绿色新能源、绿色出行、绿色回收、绿色阅读、绿色数字服务、绿色餐饮等消费生活场景，让绿色低碳生活方式融入广大消费者日常生活。目前，“绿·信·汇”低碳生态平台入驻成员已扩大至20余家，合作企业包括中国银联、中信书院、华为、腾讯、京东、VISA、南方电网、美团、曹操出行、星星充电等各行业知名企业，创新共同构建绿色低碳场景。
　　中信银行信用卡还推出了多款绿色主题产品。例如，针对高频地铁出行人群的“中信银行颜卡PASS信用卡”，以及面向新能源车主的“中信银行i车Pro白金卡”，为用户提供专属绿色权益，进一步释放绿色消费潜力。
　　中信银行信用卡的ESG实践不仅提升了企业的社会影响力，也为金融行业的绿色转型提供了可复制的经验。未来，中信银行信用卡将持续赋能碳普惠创新，推出更多绿色消费主题产品，诠释“让财富有温度”的品牌主张，助力经济社会高质量发展。

author: Luca Evans
title: Broncos safety P.J. Locke announces he had spinal surgery after 2025 wild-card game
text:
As his surgeon reached for his drawer to pull out a reflex hammer, P.J. Locke sat on a doctor’s office in mid-February, visibly nervous.
“Your favorite test,” Dr. Chad Prusmack, a neurological consultant for the Broncos, told Locke. “Relax.”
He tapped Locke’s left leg. He tapped Locke’s right leg. They twitched. Prusmack grinned up at the Broncos safety, giving him a fist-bump. And Locke clapped, beaming, the career-altering stitches on his lower back vindicated.
“It work again!” Locke cracked. “That (expletive) was dead, last time.”
On Jan. 13, 2025 — exactly one day after Locke roamed for 76 snaps in the Broncos’ wild-card loss to the Bills — the 28-year-old safety visited Prusmack’s office for an MRI. As detailed by Prusmack in a 14-minute YouTube video released Tuesday on Locke’s YouTube channel , imaging revealed that one of the discs in Locke’s spine was “completely degenerated.”
“He has bone on bone,” Prusmack pointed, looking at a scan from January. “There’s supposed to be a disc in between these.”
The result, as written in the video’s description: Locke underwent offseason spinal fusion surgery, a procedure done to connect two vertebrae in the back . It’s a massive development for the Broncos’ secondary depth, as Locke was seen at minicamp not participating in team periods — the reason now revealed.
Locke, however, is expected to be a full participant come the Broncos’ training camp in late July, a source familiar with the situation told The Denver Post.
He was a vital piece of the Broncos’ secondary in 2024, the fifth-year defensive back playing the second-most snaps of any player on the defense save now-departed linebacker Cody Barton. Locke, though, struggled in that season-ending loss to the Bills , beat on a crucial and controversial touchdown grab from Buffalo receiver Tyler Johnson.
Quietly, as detailed in a conversation between Prusmack and Locke in the video, the Broncos safety was dealing with pain in his right hip before the surgery. And Locke hinted that a pre-surgery reflex test was a “determining answer” for him to get the operation.
“Even the little bit of pain I do have from certain movements,” Locke said, “it ain’t nothing compared to what I was dealing with during the season.”
In the video, Locke is seen throughout various stages of his rehab, in one section grinding through mobility exercises in a pool.
“I just feel like I’m kicking and I ain’t really moving,” Locke told the camera, before an exercise floating on a board and propelling himself using his legs. “So, I don’t know, it’s like I gotta intentionally tell myself, man, to keep kicking, because my legs just wanna die out.”
The surgery, isn’t a career black mark. A 2016 study by Wolters Kluwer Health revealed that a majority of NFL players who’d undergone spinal-fusion surgery for herniated discs returned to play, with little difference in their performance after the operation . And Lions defensive lineman Levi Onwuzurike has retuned and played productive football after missing the 2022 season due to spinal-fusion surgery.
Locke enters training camp, coming off his own operation, looking for a pathway to snaps in a crowded safeties room after the Broncos’ signing of Talanoa Hufanga.
“I feel like, man, it’s just been a miracle,” Locke said in the video, of his recovery. “I feel like it’s been a breakthrough that I’ve been praying for.”
Want more Broncos news? Sign up for the Broncos Insider to get all our NFL analysis.

author: CNN Newsource
title: Sacerdote es acusado de morder a una mujer durante una disputa por una hostia mientras se repartía la comunión
text:
Sacerdote es acusado de morder a una mujer durante una disputa por una hostia mientras se repartía la comunión
Sofía Benavides
(CNN) — Un sacerdote de Florida está acusado de morder a una mujer mientras repartía la comunión durante una misa en la iglesia católica de Santo Tomás de Aquino en St. Cloud el domingo, en un supuesto “intento por defender el pan de la comunión”, según la declaración jurada del caso.
La policía dijo que inicialmente el sacerdote, identificado como el padre Fidel Rodríguez, le negó la comunión a la mujer, quien le había informado que “no había hecho los pasos previos necesarios para recibir el pan” en una misa anterior ese día. La mujer le dijo a la policía que regresó e informó al sacerdote que, de hecho, había hecho los pasos necesarios y que “ahora era aceptada por Dios, lo que le otorgaba la capacidad de participar en la (ceremonia)”.
La mujer dijo a la policía que el sacerdote supuestamente “se molestó y trató de meterse la ‘galleta’ en la boca”, según la declaración jurada. A su vez, ella dijo que intentó agarrar otro pan de comunión, que el sacerdote sostenía, cuando él la tomó y le mordió el brazo.
“El influencer de Dios”: el adolescente italiano que la Iglesia católica quiere convertir en el primer santo millennial
Un comunicado proporcionado por la diócesis de Orlando dijo que el sacerdote le preguntó a la mujer si “había asistido al Sacramento de la Penitencia (confesión), a lo que ella respondió que no era asunto suyo”.
“En ese momento, el padre Rodríguez ofreció a la mujer la sagrada comunión en la lengua. La mujer metió con fuerza su mano en el recipiente y agarró unas hostias sagradas, aplastándolas. Teniendo solo una mano libre, el padre Rodríguez luchó por sujetar a la mujer mientras ella se negaba a soltar las hostias. Cuando la mujer lo empujó y reaccionando ante lo percibido como un acto de agresión, el padre Rodríguez le mordió la mano para que soltara las hostias que agarraba. Inmediatamente se le pidió a la mujer que se fuera”, continúa el comunicado.
Cuando fue interrogado por la policía, el sacerdote le dijo al oficial investigador que la mujer lo había empujado y que “no soltaba la bandeja de la comunión y la única manera que pensó para que la soltara fue morderle el brazo”, según la declaración jurada.
“En la tradición católica, la Eucaristía es considerada ‘la fuente y cumbre’ del culto y la fe. Por lo tanto, el acto de participar en la sagrada comunión requiere una comprensión, reverencia y devoción adecuadas. No es algo que una persona pueda exigir arbitrariamente y ciertamente no es una simple ‘galleta’ como la llamó la denunciante”, escribió la diócesis.
La policía de St. Cloud ha enviado un resumen de los acontecimientos en forma de declaración jurada a la oficina del fiscal del Estado para su revisión. CNN se comunicó con la Oficina del Fiscal Estatal del Noveno Circuito Judicial para solicitar comentarios.
The-CNN-Wire
™ & © 2024 Cable News Network, Inc., a Warner Bros. Discovery Company. All rights reserved.

author: Andrea Camurani
title: Varese - Varese si ferma per lo sciopero generale: corteo di oltre 3 mila persone in centro - - Varese News
text:
Varese si ferma per lo sciopero generale: corteo di oltre 3 mila persone in centro
Alta l'adesione alla fermata dal lavoro che secondo i sindacati organizzatori (Cgil e Uil) ha raggiunto picchi dell'80%. I motivi della protesta
È alta l’adesione allo sciopero generale indetto da Cgil e Uil per la giornata di venerdì 29 novembre. Anche Varese partecipa alle manifestazioni che si tengono in ogni capoluogo di provincia.
In piazza Repubblica intorno alle 9 hanno cominciato a concentrarsi un gran numero di lavoratori che secondo gli organizzatori supera le 3mila presenze. Poi una volta riempita la piazza il corteo ha cominciato a sfilare per le vie del centro.
IL CORTEO
Il corteo ha seguito un preciso percorso: via Avegno, via Vittorio Veneto, corso Aldo Moro, piazza Monte Grappa, via Walter Marcobi, via Sacco, via San Vito Silvestro, via XXV Aprile. In Piazza Libertà, sede della Prefettura, gli interventi delle delegati e delegati, della Segretaria Generale Cgil Varese Stefania Filetti e del Coordinatore territoriale Uil Antonio Massafra.
«CONTESTIAMO LA MANOVRA»
«Questa è una manovra di bilancio fatta di tagli e non di sostengo ai lavoratori e ai pensionati nè al servizio sanitario nazionale», ha spiegato la segretaria provinciale della Cgil Stefania Filetti. «È urgente vedere una strada che porti a uno sviluppo. La crisi che sta arrivando in Europa sta colpendo soprattutto il settore manifatturiero, di cui l’Italia è ancora il secondo Paese europeo. Dobbiamo fronteggiare la crisi in diversi settori, tra cui quello automobilistico».
Il sindacato è preoccupato per il contenuto della legge di bilancio soprattutto per il sistema sanitario «che sta crollando, ma anche per una fiscalità a favore dei lavoratori», ha spiegato sempre durante il corteo a Varesenews il segretario provinciale della Uil Antonio Massafra. Prioritario, secondo chi sciopera, è l’impegno del Governo rispetto alla lotta all’evasione fiscale. «I salari devono recuperare il potere d’acquisto che è il più basso d’Europa a causa dell’inflazione. Inoltre va ridiscussa rimessa in piedi una politica industriale anche a fronte delle nuove sfide che riguardano l’arrivo dell’intelligenza artificiale e i temi ambientali».
I MOTIVI DELLO SCIOPERO
I principali motivi della mobilitazione includono:
Aumento di salari e pensioni per contrastare la perdita del potere d’acquisto causata dall’inflazione e da politiche fiscali poco eque.
Finanziamenti adeguati a sanità, istruzione e servizi pubblici, evitando i tagli previsti dal Governo Meloni.
Investimenti nelle politiche industriali per difendere l’occupazione, ridurre la precarietà e promuovere uno sviluppo sostenibile.
Revisione della Legge Monti/Fornero per una maggiore equità nel sistema pensionistico.
Opposizione al Disegno di Legge Sicurezza, ritenuto un attacco alle libertà costituzionali e al diritto di manifestare.
I sindacati chiedono inoltre di tassare profitti straordinari, rendite e grandi ricchezze per finanziare interventi straordinari nei settori pubblici e favorire il rinnovo dei contratti collettivi, con l’obiettivo di migliorare le condizioni di vita e lavoro.

author: Ariana Joy Cobler
title: North Platte man sentenced to prison after standoff and assault charges - NewsBreak
text:
NebraskaTV
website
North Platte
North Platte man sentenced to prison after standoff and assault charges
By Ariana Joy Cobler,
1 days agoNORTH PLATTE, Neb. — A North Platte man has been sentenced to eight to 10 years in prison following charges related to a standoff with police and holding a woman against her will. According to Lincoln County District Court records, Kristopher Weitzel was sentenced on charges of third-degree domestic assault and a weapons charge. Weitzel had previously pleaded no contest to these charges.
1

author: Dr Nathalie Szapiro
title: Les compléments alimentaires ne sont pas sans risques | Le Quotidien du Médecin
text:
